Text: AirTran Airways Grade A Sale ends soon Our partner Our Lucaya Beach and Golf Resort is offering a special promotion from just per person on beautiful Grand Bahama Island Please be sure to see details of this offer below our sale fare information We just wanted to remind you that ticketing for our Grade A sale for travel through May ends this Thursday January at midnight This sale requires a day advance purchase and discounts range up to off the already low fares we offer everyday Seats are limited and may be unavailable on some days and flights that operate during peak and holiday travel times such as the Presidents Day and Easter holiday periods Travel on sale fares to and from Fort Lauderdale Fort Myers Miami Orlando and Tampa must be complete by February You must purchase sale tickets by January Receive a BONUS eachway discount if you make your sale fare booking online at wwwairtrancom Remember Travel may originate in either city and all fares are oneway and dont you at Our Lucaya Beach Golf Resort Grand Bahama Islands newest resort Located just less than a hour flight from Atlanta Our Lucaya Beach Golf Resort lets you escape this winter starting at only per person per night in our family friendly Reef Village With acres of beach outrageous pools championship golf courses the Butch Harmon School of Golf tennis land and sea activities a free childrens camp Senses Spa and fitness center and a selection of restaurants and lounges your only worry this winter will be whether youll have enough time to do it all Call tollfree OURLUCAYA prompt today to reserve your winter getaway and come alive at Grand Bahamas newest most spectacular resort Be sure to ask about upgrading to one of our spectacular ocean view rooms Visit us online at wwwourlucayacom and see what awaits you Rules and Restrictions Valid for new bookings made by Price is per person per night based on islandview double occupancy for travel through per person per night for travel Does not include per person per night service charge or tax per room Airfare not included Holiday and peak period rates may vary Availability is limited Rates not valid or for groups Grade A Sale Fares other rules and restrictions All fares are oneway All fares are nonrefundable and a per person fee applies to any change made after purchase plus any applicable increase in airfare Travel on sale fares must be purchased no later than January All travel must be complete by May Travel to and from Fort Lauderdale Fort Myers Orlando Miami and Tampa must be complete by February Fares have a day advance purchase restriction and may be combined with regular fares to complete an itinerary Travel is not valid on February or on March or on April Travel also may not be available to and from select cities during other periods of high passenger demand Seats are limited and subject to availability Fares dont include segment taxes of for each segment A segment is defined as a takeoff and landing Airport passenger facility charges of up to are not included Fares tofrom Grand Bahama Island do not include in roundtrip taxes As a subscriber to AirTran Airways Net Escapes we send you regular updates on our Internet specials If you need to contact us for any other reason please call us at AIRTRAN or in Atlanta call Please note that any reference to Net Escapes fares Feature City fares or bonus discounts for booking online may ONLY be purchased on our web site Please click UMUaspB and you will be removed immediately Or To unsubscribe mailto or if the emailaddress is not clickable simply copy the text to the right of the mailto command and paste it into your email application and hit send You will be taken off the list immediately Thank you
